website_summaries.verdict: These goggles look really good, but fall short when it comes to performance.
pros: The frame is thick, the lens is big, and the magnets holding everything together are strong
The style matches goggles twice the price
cons: The strap isn't very long and the lens scratches easily
For some, they fog up very quickly

customer_reviews.title: I was so hopeful that this would be a great product. Upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful that this would be a great product. Upon receipt, it looked good, it fit nice, and I was overall pretty happy with this purchase. When I got out to get some skiing going, initially this was great. This fit nice, it didn't fog, and it greatly reduced the sun. However, after less than an hour, the stitching that holds the strap to the frame came undone and the glasses fell off. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Not wide view
customer_reviews.text: Lens looks really big, but doesn’t give you really wide view. I usually use dragon glasses, and used to really wide view on the sides. Removable lens is great idea, but something is done wrong, so it steams up inside. Missed return date, so now it’s a toy for my 3-year-old.
customer_reviews.author: BlueSage

customer_reviews.title: Best goggles I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.text: Best goggles I've owned. Rode yesterday in some mild snowfall @Copper Mtn, these goggles kept my face warm and dry and didn't fog at all. Strap held in place nice and I actually changed lenses on the fly when the sun hid and the snow started. So easy and magnet held strong. Nothing but compliments on the awesome style and look of these goggles. They seem pretty durable, hopefully they last many seasons for a fraction of the price of big name goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... all thought they looked dope and the magnets feel like there good quality best goggles iv tried so far ...
customer_reviews.text: Took these out today and they were sick about 27 degrees all day no fogging issues my buddy's all thought they looked dope and the magnets feel like there good quality best goggles iv tried so far I'm gonna pick up a few more lenses colors although the blues are dope
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Venetucci

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lens but scratches very easy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lens but scratches very easy. Did not fog up. I'd give it 5 stars if it didn't scratch so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Pat McGoin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect goggles
customer_reviews.text: I hardly write reviews.... These goggles were one fifth the cost of my last pair, and 5x better! I ended up getting the yellow lens as well since upstate NY is mostly gray skies and swapping lens out with one another was all of 2 seconds! SUPER AWESOME! Starting to see a lot more of this brand on the slopes. I get it it's a discount goggle, and some ski for the fashion of it....but not me. I ski for the fun of skiing, and don't care what I am billboarding down the slopes! I would have paid 2x as much. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: David A. Lamore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome-sauce
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. I had gotten a pair for my birthday and had to share the awesome-ness. The lenses are held on with magnets making it easy to leave the frame on the helmet but pack away the lenses safely. This also will make it easy to update/replace later. Besides looking cool, they fit very comfortably and have enough air flow through them that you don't freeze and don't fog up. Looking forward to see how they hold up to multiple seasons.
customer_reviews.author: BluePandaTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles great price
customer_reviews.text: I have used Zionor goggles for a couple seasons now and they are great I love being able to change goggle lenses. I had the ones you have to kinda snap in with the tabs but these magnet lenses are the bomb! They stay on even when you crash and are still way easy to change out. Bought enough for friends Christmas presents at 18.50 cant beat such a nice set of goggles. I wasn’t paid for this review or given anything free but if they wanted to I would take some extra lenses lol.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Scratched
customer_reviews.text: Goggles seem of decent quality. The fit is a little “off” with the strap riding low on your head - if you try to wear them like normal they pull up too high and you can’t see. Also, the goggles were packaged well but mine arrived with a scratch on the lense under the protective removable film. Definitely a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: topherBradley

customer_reviews.title: Here's an Instance Where I Question Fake Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Terrible goggles... Aside from anything else, the fit of these goggles are awful. They fit very flat, with very little contour to the shape of your face, so you have to tighten the strap to horribly uncomfortable levels to get them to fit snugly against your face. If you don't do that, you get lots of wind blowing into your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Chikinbutt

customer_reviews.title: Fogs a lot. Water goes between the lens casing ...
customer_reviews.text: Fogs a lot. Water goes between the lens casing and you are screwed after that. Takes a lot of time for the water to dry up.
customer_reviews.author: Prashanth D. Parate

customer_reviews.title: Great product, weak adhesive
customer_reviews.text: I've used these on 3 separate days out snowboarding. If I use them like normal goggles- they work perfectly, and they look fantastic. I believe due to the cold- the adhesive becomes too weak for the magnets. When I try to separate the magnetic lens fixture from the frame without being very careful, the adhesive holding it together will start to separate and the lens will pull from the magnets it's attached to. I played with this feature a dozen or so times before taking them snowboarding with no issues, but I have to be careful not to separate them now.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Steele

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this at Lake Tahoe and Banff, Canada and had great results so far! It hasn’t fogged up and no scratches yet. Keep it mind using thick barclavas will usually cause fogging so I use very thin ones with no fog. Also I keep it in protective cloth as much as possible when not in use. I Haven’t used the extra lens I purchased yet but the Magnetic changeable lens has stayed put even after some high speed spills. Fits well with Smith helmets as seen in pic. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yobe

customer_reviews.title: Medium quality, inexpensive, useful lens design capability
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. He already has several pairs of googles but didn't have the interchangeable lens variety. The lenses ( I bought a second lense separately) seemed scuffed/scratched. Not in a big way that makes them unusable but enough that I wondered whether they were a return or just carelessly packed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: I tested these goggles along with the outdoor master, smith project, and oakley flight decks. These ones pinch my nose less than the Oakleys or the outdoor masters, but more than the smith project. I also found that despite the bubble design these cut off my peripheral vision more than the smith project or the Oakley flight deck, but about the same as the outdoor masters. Over all a decent goggle, but I ended up returning these and going with the smith project for less nose pinch and wider vision. Unfortunately neither the smiths or the Oakleys have interchangeable lenses.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Value Buy
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Magnets are quite strong and I do not see them separating under normal circumstances. I used them for two days in March, one day and one night. No fogging issues at all. I also purchased the yellow lense for night riding and no sun days... it was ok for both. The blue mirror was great in partly cloudy conditions. However, black and clear is probably the best two lense combination as the other reviewers stated. Regardless, great value for the price. I bought to replace a pair of Smith goggles more than twice the price and I like these just fine.
customer_reviews.author: da_raw_deal

customer_reviews.title: Truly is a Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the super reviews, I purchased two pairs and took them to ski Tahoe in March. What a fabulous product! They worked very well albeit a snug fit on our helmets, and we had a day of white out conditions in addition to super sunny days, so I plan on buying a lense with a higher VLC for those very sunny days, but I loved the light orange lense for the overcast/white out conditions. Great find on Amazon. Will buy my son a pair next.
customer_reviews.author: SiliconValleyPulse

customer_reviews.title: As good as the $150 name brand goggles
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 14 year old snowboarding daughter. She absolutely loves them! Clear optics, very comfortable foam on the face, adjustable strap, and stylish. As good as the $150 name brand goggles.
customer_reviews.author: BigwaveD

customer_reviews.title: Happy After One Season
customer_reviews.text: I've used these for 6 months now, and I'm really happy overall. They're clear and comfortable and have only fogged up once or twice. Even when they do fog, it goes away on its own fairly quickly. The only issue I've had is that the strap seems to loosen after a bit, but if you store these inside your helmet (rather than around) this shouldn't be an issue. A word of advice -- buy two sets of lenses, one dark and one light. I bought only the black lenses because I wanted to spend as little as possible, but the black tint makes overcast days interesting to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Mart George

customer_reviews.title: You need these!
customer_reviews.text: We were set to ski in < 10 temps from the forecast. I typically ski in sunglasses because I've always hated the gogles I've used in the past. Technology has come a long way and these didn't fog unless I had put them somewhere wet/swetty/hot immediately before using (wet hair). For the price you simply can't go wrong. If you think you need goggles the price is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Griller

customer_reviews.title: Typical Goggle, but glass does not fit
customer_reviews.text: Goggle functions as it typically does, nothing special nor wrong. To be honest, there would be nothing wrong with buying cheaper goggles, which would feel and work the same way. However, the description said the glasses fit, but I cannot wear these goggles with glasses on. When I wear the glasses inside the goggles, the glasses squeeze in and makes me so uncomfortable. I am sure the glasses for kids would fit, but typical adult size glasses, nope. I have contact lens that I do not really like wearing while skiing, but that would be the only way to use the goggles.
customer_reviews.author: Wooseok Choi

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Made of hard, not flexible plastic. Tried on myself, my wife, and on my sister. Did not fit to anyone. They painfully pushing on the nose. Also, magnetic holding is a terrible and dangerous idea. In the very first day I was on the lift and touched goggles with finger, trying to adjust them on face. Lens fell off from a single touch. I end up staying on the top of black diamond slope under heavy snowstorm and without goggles. In my personal opinion this product should not even be on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Ark Z.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and look cool too
customer_reviews.text: I received and used these last week in the start of a good sized snow storm in summit county Colorado they held up great went from around 12000 ft down to 9000 and never fogged up they didn't get icy until I took a cat ride to the top where there was no ventilation in the cab if it wasn't for the ppl packed inside they would have been fine. The storms still hitting so I'll be putting them to good use in the trees
customer_reviews.author: Jason roberts

customer_reviews.title: NOT ANTI FOG
customer_reviews.text: These goggles look and fit great...but they are absolutely not anti fog. I was skiing on a clear sunny 30deg day, and just my own breathe caused them to fog up. And it was not on the outer or inner lense, it was in between them where i couldnt wipe it off. The seal between the two lenses is no good and allows moisture to get in between, and at that point, they are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually wore before leaving review.
customer_reviews.text: So far the goggles have been very good. I took them for a day trip so far and I didn't have any fog issues with the lenses. I purchased the all black set. They came with a plastic screen protecting from scratches during travel. They main reason I am giving it the 4 is because when adjusting the size of the strap the plastic piece doesn't glide very well. I will be taking them on a two day trip to Telluride, CO will update after that trip if these have any issues. I did see Zionor all over the mountain I was on. That was dope.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Eckhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just before a week long ski trip when I realized my old goggles were broken. I bought them because they were cheap and could get to me in time, but I didn't expect much. However, these goggles out-performed any expectation, I wore them all week and loved them! They were comfortable, blocked out the sunlight, looked really cool, and didn't get scratched. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a new pair of goggles. In my opinion way better value that the $150 Oakley goggles that you see at every ski shop.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Magnets!
customer_reviews.text: These are worth much more. They fogged up a few times, but after treating them they were amazing. I love that the lens is attached by magnets. They are so easy to remove. Would love to buy a clear lens attachment for night sessions.
customer_reviews.author: fantasy592

customer_reviews.title: Big Performance
customer_reviews.text: These things were ordered to replace some 5year old pair of old school googles i grabbed for $50 off WhiskeyMilitia First time with so much view ability, rarely ever fog, I’ve dropped em and hit my board on them a few times with no scratches, and definitely keep the cold out. I plan to buy new lenses asap! Def Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Terrell

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY CONTROL
customer_reviews.text: POOR QUALITY CONTROL: Overall these goggles are okay, but the lenses came with spots in between the lens and the first time out, as well as any of the following times out, moisture gets in between the two lense, freezes and they become absolutely useless. Very disappointed really wish i had had a better experience with these goggle and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bakerv

customer_reviews.title: Great for low light
customer_reviews.text: Nice goggles, just wore them I'm low light conditions and they were great. I have a different pair for full sun. For the excellent price these are great for low light,flat light when you need a higher VLT
customer_reviews.author: greenpeace

customer_reviews.title: Great B4B
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so i was concerned that they would be big because people said they were big and i think if you have an averaged width face they will work perfect. like if you can fit most of the glasses at any random store then i would call that average. if you have to go to the youth sizes or big sizes then your face prob wont fit well. Great B4B, especially if you are used to the cheap goggles these will be amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jared M

customer_reviews.title: Very good price for a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I am replacing a pair of 35 year old goggles. So, I did not make the choice on the spur of the moment. These Zionor have the featuresI needed; UV protection, anti-fog and easy adjustment. These will see sports and snow removal duty. I think you would need to pay a lot more for equivalent goggles. Thanks for the choices and the quality product.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggle for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these last season for our son who is a snowboarder. The kid loves the goggle and all his friends say they look like goggles that cost $80+. I like the fact that the lens are held on by magnets and can be replaced easily. The have not yet fogged up either which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: PistolGear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cheap goggles
customer_reviews.text: These haven't fogged up yet all year and fit great with my new helmet. You can't see my eyes in the black lens at all. They aren't Smith or Oakley but are similar to how you can find a good pair of lasting sunglasses for $20. I even bought a second low light lens that swaps in seconds
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of goggles
customer_reviews.text: I'll let the others get into all the tech spec comparisons with the most expensive brands. Look, here's the deal, these goggles are solid performers, clarity is great, selection is nearly unlimited, and the price for the quality is simply unbelievable. The only thing is you have to be willing to sport an off brand logo on the side of your helmet or hat, oh the horror!
customer_reviews.author: M. Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised, great design and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Because I ski in conditions that often change the ability to easily switch a lens is a key advantage of this excellent product. The magnets insure both a secure and virtually airtight seal. So far I have experienced zero fogging on the inside of the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Maturity

customer_reviews.title: They look great. DO NOT FOG UP$
customer_reviews.text: It is great! Zero fog. Looks awesome. Best googles I have ever owned. My wife And I both love them. update 12/24/18 I have now had them for a few weeks and 6 ski trips. Still amazing. today was wet and cold my face mask was wet and under my goggles ZERO FOG. no scratches after a couple good spills. I keep em in the bag hey came in. The Revo blue is really fine in a lot of conditions I have not had to change it out for the clear lens I bought as well. which would be easy if I did. the magnet system is great. My wife has the pink she concurs with me. Happy trails
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fog and easy to
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these goggles along with the hard case and a second lense and they were amazing! Easy to change the lenses as they are magnetic and pop On and off with ease. Do not Fog up at all!! My friends that went to mammoth on our last trip had all bought new googles, all of which were in excess of 200 and they all had problems with fogging and fit. Mine were perfect fit and totally functional with no hiccups! I highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice goggles but I have the mirrored lenses and they ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice goggles but I have the mirrored lenses and they scratch SO easily...I’m talking...be careful wiping snow from them...rode twice have 3 distinct scratches and honestly have no idea how they came to be
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of these goggles despite them being a little big for my face. They are super sleek and very comfortable to wear. Visibility is great through the lens even when it’s snowing BUT the peripheral vision field is slightly worse than other goggles I’ve used. The lens is easy to switch out and it comes with a nice carrying case. Overall great goggles for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Warning - Replacement Lens Hard to Find
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give this 5 stars, but after trying to order additional lenses, need to lower to 2 stars. Positive: - Works great - Easy to change lenses - Very Good visibility Con: - Replacement lenses are hard to find and out of stock - When email support, it gets returned.
customer_reviews.author: JohnC

customer_reviews.title: Scratched up
customer_reviews.text: They came wrapped in paper and the external lens was covered in scratches
customer_reviews.author: David P. Groh

customer_reviews.title: Best value. Solid performance. Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I've used them 5 times now in the Colorado mountains. They are easily scratched so be careful. But honestly you can't beat these for price and the magnetic lenses are so easy to replace I got the yellow lense with it and I'd buy a pair of these every year before buying anymore expensive ones that don't offer many advantages.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Gerdes

customer_reviews.title: 1st Time Snowboarder
customer_reviews.text: As you can imagine, I spent a lot of time in precarious positions and overall pretty pleased with the performance of the googles. Keep in mind this is my first time wearing snow goggles so I have nothing to compare them against, but I did not experience any fogging issues. Every once in a while I had to adjust them due to them pressing down on my nose a little more than I preferred, but that doesn't seem particularly out of the ordinary. Either way, for $30, I fell like I've gotten my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: use these for motorcycle riding. very comfortable and well built. and the design eliminates ALL fog for use during winter. only gripe is that it cuts off a bit of your peripheral vision, but probably not a big deal for those that use it for snow sports.
customer_reviews.author: A. Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Big name quality for little name price. Magnetic lens ...
customer_reviews.text: Big name quality for little name price. Magnetic lens removal. I have multiple lenses for use on various weather days. These have taken a few tumbles and spills with me as I was learning to snowboard. They have held up to every crash and every ride down the hill. No scratches and the elastic is still pliable and stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Keep them dry!
customer_reviews.text: I love these as they are quite stylish and comfy. Just a word of caution to you all, not just for this brand. But for snow goggles in general. Make sure to hang dry them thoroughly after each use. Otherwise you may end up with a nasty skin rash/infection where your skin comes in contact with it. It took me three weeks to fully recover from a huge red rash on my nose. It’s not the end of the world, but it looked pretty nasty.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Mak

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: These goggles were designed solidly. For really modest price you will get a pair with modern features including spherical shape and magnetic attachment. They look attractive too. Unfortunately, the plastic strap adjuster was broken on the second day I used them. One cannot change it as is. One need to get another frame. Luckily, Zionor provides excellent customer service and I got replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite pair of boarding goggles!
customer_reviews.text: These things are rad! I bought a white pair for my sister and the black pair for me, the front is magnetic interchangeable and holds phenomenally, looks great, fits great, I didn’t want to take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Word Up, It's Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great Eye Protection, Fog Build-up
customer_reviews.text: Wore this with a balaclava for the cold (-20, -30 C): Prevented glare, protected my eyes from the winds and outdoor elements, but fog build up turned into an issue after around 10 minutes. Had to clear the fog out of the visor interior before it condensed/froze up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lam

customer_reviews.title: Great look-sometimes has fog/moisture
customer_reviews.text: These goggles look extremely sleek and stylish from exterior point of view. They fit the face nicely and cover a great portion of it without needing a face mask. Visibility wise they are excellent to see through. My only complaint is about the fog/moisture. They claim to be anti-fog, which they are most of the time but a few times last season my goggles would fog up and retain some moisture inside on the bottom portion of the lenses so I was still able to see.
customer_reviews.author: Radical Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Nice goggles - too big for my small face
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews and based my purchase on them. I love the goggles! Only thing I can say is that they are not the best fit for a petite female face. They do fit well with the Zionor helmet. If I had known how large the goggles would be on my face, I probably would have looked further before purchasing. I haven't had any issues with scratches, but I do protect them well by using the soft case and storing them in the hard case (separate purchase - great item!).
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great lenses for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just be warned that these are for sunny conditions. In fog or snow you cannot really see. Which could be a problem if you were sliding down a mountain on ice... But seriously, good goggles, an they looked good.
customer_reviews.author: ZackD

customer_reviews.title: Styling quality you can’t beat
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous !!! ATV use and love that it works so well, envy of all the other riders Quality lens, my eyes are light sensitive and I keep a light and dark lens with me at all times ... the switch out and storage saks make it unbelievably easy to have
customer_reviews.author: NstCmt

customer_reviews.title: Goggles worked great - no fogging - lense is easy to remove ...
customer_reviews.text: Goggles worked great - no fogging - lense is easy to remove but is study enough that it didn't detach when I took a few hard falls. Was extremely impressed with the quality of the goggles considering the low cost point. Also received a TON of compliments on the look of the goggles which was the main reason I bought them other than hoping they would perform decently well. These exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Max McKendry

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: These goggles are tinted very darkly and give a terrific field of vision. They also look good on. These are a very nice construction and comfortable fit. I'm extremely satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Great Goggles
customer_reviews.text: Despite being polarized, I could see everything in front of me. They look great on. Good buy for the price, but tip! When skiing, never take your goggles off. I did and all the moisture inside my goggles froze and i couldn't see. As long as I kept these on, I could see fine.
customer_reviews.author: Regina W.

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, scratch easily.
customer_reviews.text: I wore these in Breckenridge and Keystone skiing for two days 15 degrees/38 degrees and sunny! They were great, unfortunately they already have a scratch. They were connected to my helmet, and in their protective case when not in use. I bit it twice, so maybe that's when they got scratched. Still, I'd say get them.
customer_reviews.author: Just Browsing

customer_reviews.title: Wow they work great with no fogging and good visibility.
customer_reviews.text: I skiid with them yesterday. The lense was easy to attach and, even though my goggles tend to fog, I had no fogging with these. I just returned $200 Smith goggles with fogging problems. I thought about buying $350 goggles with a fan. I'll be keeping these instead. What a savings and fast shipping. I very seldom leave reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money if your a serious MT bum
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned many top brand goggles. You do dumb stuff enough you destroy your gear. I said let’s take a chance in a cheaper pair. It’s a huge surprise how great these did. The fit very well. Love the lens choices. Most of all the easiest way to exchange a lens ever. None of my $200/300 goggles ever did this. I’m done buying top name brands as far as goggles are concerned. Even if these were of terrible quality the magnetic lens sells it for me. It’s a bonus these are actually durable and very comfortable. Time will tell but I’ll be purchasing more lenses soon.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but too small for an American
customer_reviews.text: Great google and a ton of people have them on the mountain. However they are not as big as they look. They are of an average size and I find myself looking at the frame edges constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice and some people just talked to me saying it ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks really nice and some people just talked to me saying it is a good-looking goggle. The thing is the snow somehow got into the sealed place between the glass and the plastic cover in my first use so it became very foggy. What's worse is you cannot wipe them because you can't touch it unless you removed the plastic. I have to think twice if I am going to buy a glass replacement for this goggle or simply turn to the other brand... Edit: Zionor contacted very soon after I left my review. Now I have received some new replacements from them. Change it 5 stars to show how I impressed with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Chenying Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles; works great with Zionor helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great goggles; works great with Zionor helmet. But the item arrived scratched and looks like have been used before. This was purchased as a gift for my father. Returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Lavoilerougechka

customer_reviews.title: comfort and convenience
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my other goggles and ended up with these. Wish I had found these before I as my eyes do not do good in dark. Being able to change the lens to the color that best fits my vision on the day Im on slopes made a huge difference. comfort and warmth is as good as any goggle ive used in the past
customer_reviews.author: Joe Palma

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Totally amazed by quality. Great price. Hate not supporting local ski shop, but for waaaay lot less, I got comparable quality. Update 2/18: I've used these goggles now for two seasons. Skied in Colorado, Canada and the east coast. I would give them 6 stars if I could. So easy to switch lenses depending on conditions. Every now and then you find a great product at an affordable price, especially compared to the competition. I love the goggles and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Like these goggles
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be well made, perfect fit and the magnetic attachment is awesome. I can change lenses quickly depending on light conditions. This color lens is good for low light or medium light situations. I hope the lens holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Monroe

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: I am still very satisfied with this price/performance ratio, and the mirror above is magnet-absorbed. But a little small, There is a little squeeze in the bridge of the nose....
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great, amazing product, would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product, it cane perfectly on time and I used it on the slopes of Snowmass in Aspen Colorado. I got the grey one, and it was perfect for blocking out the sun! My recommendation is to do some research before buying a certain color, because each color is used for different things. For example, the one I got is perfect for day skiing but not so great for night skiing because it makes it darker than it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Gabyak

customer_reviews.title: Why did I do this
customer_reviews.text: Lol I bought thus for protection going to the stores and I look like a bee haha they’re a little loose and I can tighten them up!!! Hope they save me from covid!!! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Mon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality/REASONABLE price!
customer_reviews.text: Hey guys, so I just got back from snowboarding in Big Sky Montana highest peak and wore this item! I fell about a good 3x considering the peak we’re all DOUBLE BLACK DIAMONDS and ohh lord is this goggle not only pretty sexy to wear but sturdy! My only very very minor issue is that if it’s hazy or cloudy up in the mountains, it can be a little hard to see through but still manageable to snowboard down the slope. Overall, am pleased with my purchase and hopefully if the company is reading the comments, they would be willing to send me an additional green lense, free of charge ;). Johnny
customer_reviews.author: John Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I felt it was time to buy a helmet and some google. Boy did I wish I did it sooner. This mask looks exceptional, the reflective film is high quality and really shades me from the light. It also does not fog up easily allow air to circulate within the googles. It is also rather comfortable. All in all, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Originally bought for $20 as a great value but easily scratches and retains moisture stains
customer_reviews.text: When I first bought the goggles I was quite excited that I was able to buy something that seemed comparable to other goggles at an amazing bargain. After using these lens for maybe (5/6) times I am a tad disappointed in how easily it scratches (they do warn you) and also how it retains moisture stains. Still am a fan of this product at the original price point but don't know if I'd be able to recommend it to others given that it looks like it doubled in price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing goggles
customer_reviews.text: Easy to scratch but if you are careful with then lenses, you won't have any issues. Also it's only 20 bucks for new lenses that snap on so easily. If you are ok without the name brand , these are sometimes better than the fancy expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I've used the same pair for like 5 years, so when I did a little searching, found these, and I am not disappointed. They look great, they fit perfectly, and they've held up so far. No trouble with the lens or hindering vision. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Walker

customer_reviews.title: Do not fog up
customer_reviews.text: I don't downhill ski or snowboard. I bought these goggles to use when snowplowing a 900 foot driveway in below zero temps during strong winds. Work perfect! Clear wide vision and best of all these do not fog up. I am very impressed with the build quality of these goggles.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Light red is not what the picture looks like. they are red, like not light red but red.
customer_reviews.text: the reason i gave 4 stars is that everything was perfect except for the color. The picture is a little decieving , it says its light red and the picture look slightly pinkish which is why i got them because I wanted them for my gf and from the picture i was expecting it to be a light red to where it was almost pinkish tint but no its red not even light red just red. that was the only reason other than that they are great goggles and these are the second pair ive bought.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good goggles
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty good. They do fog up a little every now and then but not too bad. Lenses are great and magnets are super strong. The silicon grip on the straps are great. The only thing weird is the end of the goggles where the straps are flip up and down but I don’t know why they do that. There is no mention of it anywhere on the product and no one can answer what the purpose is.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Porrino

customer_reviews.title: Scratched after 1 day of use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these before a weekend ski trip to Mt. Gore in NY. After just 1 day of snowboarding in icy/foggy conditions, the mirror film on the lens had a large scratch directly in the center. Was very disappointed as they were rather comfortable and the silicon on the headband to grip the helmet was a nice feature. I would stay away, especially if you ride in the Northeast where conditions are frequently icy.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Mazza

customer_reviews.title: Great goggles! No fogging and good visibility
customer_reviews.text: Snowboarder for twenty plus years and have had many goggles. These were great and at a great price point. Easy to switch out the lenses based on the visibility/light for that day. Loved the magnetic lenses! No fogging or dripping inside the lenses at all when I used them on a pow day.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdgirl75

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer defect with lens
customer_reviews.text: This is our 3rd pair of Zionor goggles. The first 2 were great, but this last pair was flawed. The inside lens coating has a bubble on the lens tinting. It run verticle right in view of the right eye.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley F

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great for a quick fix and when you don't spend a lot of time is the slopes. I would spend more money if I was more into winter sports.
customer_reviews.author: Widel Velez

customer_reviews.title: Great google. Functional and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Took it to the mountain the first time and cannot be more satisfied. It's comfortable to wear. The foam and the flexibility on the frame make it fit to your face well. There was zero fogging issue for the whole day which is my biggest complain on my older SPY google even when I was heavy breathing. It also has slightly bigger visibility. Overall a happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EthanC

customer_reviews.title: Field of view disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Returning because field of view is disappointing for a spherical lens goggle. Otherwise seem like great goggles, nice colors and materials
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great lens!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a lens for low light skiing scenarios...these worked out perfectly! I got two, one for my daughter and one for me. They're easy to swap in and out...and again, worked out perfectly! I would buy again without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Rutter

customer_reviews.title: Good google for a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of magnetic lens goggles since they first came out. They are easy to swap out. I have been an Anon magnetic lens customer for some time. I found these goggles online and bought a pair. I have been wearing them for a few months and bought another for my wife. I cannot tell the difference between the Anon and Zionor X4. That is except that the Zionor is a fraction of the price. The complete X4 was less than the Anon replacement lens.
customer_reviews.author: BP@Oberland

customer_reviews.title: Zionor, They are Excellent
customer_reviews.text: First, Please accept my Humble Apology concerning the missing Carrying Case. I have come to find that it is necessary, to keep an eye on nieces and nephews when you are opening packages and leave them alone in the room. The case was not missing, it had been abducted by 2 fun loving Rascals !!! All three Googles where delivered in Excellent Condition and package with the utmost care. Thank You and I will recommend you to others !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy008

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of googles for under $40
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and convenient with the detachable magnetic lens. The vents help prevent excessive fogging and the wide lens do not block out your peripheral vision.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher T

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. I use them for snowmobiling, skiing, snowboarding, looking good to meet some ladies. Thesegoggles can do it all. The magnetic feature is something I was a little leery about because what if the magnets wear down and the thing falls off but they really don't. This product is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: My teen son used for a day of skiing and the goggles worked great! So cool that they have the magnetin mechanism to swap lenses too! Also nice gripping compound on the strap to help it stay in place on your helmet.
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Not too good
customer_reviews.text: They fog up as soon as your body temp heats up. Also water got in between the two glasses. They also scratch easily
customer_reviews.author: High-water

customer_reviews.title: Great quality goggles
customer_reviews.text: These goggles have a very nice fit and are exactly as you would expect. The price is good for the quality that you get and the ease of changing out the lenses make them all that much more worth it. I may get some darker lenses for them later to switch out on brighter days as well. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Spayde

customer_reviews.title: Snowblower Happiness
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and very warm - excellent purchase, bought them for snow-blowing the driveway and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fasnacht

customer_reviews.title: Quick, convenient, good price-- Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The googles arrived quickly. They looked exactly like they did online and were the size I needed/expected. I really like that I can get a couple of pairs of replacement lenses for just a little more money and I'm considering getting their case. The bag they come in is nice for keeping the googles clean, but I normally store my snow stuff in a bin where they could be smashed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic lens!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic love that the lens pops on and off and is magnetic , didn't even realize that feature when I bought them also they are very warm and comfortable. Going to buy the entire family one for our trip.
customer_reviews.author: just me..

customer_reviews.title: My Son loves his new Ski Goggles
customer_reviews.text: He received these for Christmas and weather was definitely not cooperating for him to try out! However, the artic winds are now blowing and he has used these 4 or 5 times in the past 2 weeks. He really likes them and is so protective of the lens! These are great looking and work well! Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dezygns12

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a desert trip, so I tested them by mowing the lawn in NE Texas in June. My eyes didn't sweat, and when I faced the wind there was a gentle airflow through the sides. Field of vision is excellent and it's super easy to switch to the yellow lens. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Digital Gunsmith

customer_reviews.title: Fit and Finish are great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife and I went with a different pair to try the waters. These were slightly better than the pair i bought from a different company. For the price there can be nothing better.
customer_reviews.author: chance edwards

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on cloudy days
customer_reviews.text: These lenses worked great in MI and in CO for cloudy days. One day in CO when i wore them it was a bit rainy at he bottom of the hill so the sponge on the top got really wet. That would've happened to any goggles though. Other than that, then never fogged and were easy to take out and change if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Great for sunny days
customer_reviews.text: The googles are nice and beautiful! it fits perfectly on my helmet. It’s not that easy to see on cloudy days but perfect for sunny ones.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, but I used them 1st to go snow skiing. They fit great and the lens was perfect! Strong mangetics, no fogging, and clear view with no sun in your eyes. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

product_meta.title: ZIONOR X4 Ski Snowboard Snow Goggles Magnet Dual Layers Lens Spherical Design Anti-fog UV Protection Anti-slip Strap for Men Women (VLT 13.67% Blue Frame Revo Blue Lens)
feature_bullets: High Performance Anti-fog & UV Protection - Ski & snowboard goggles with unique anti-fogging treatment and 100% UV400 protection coating.
Magnetic Lens Technology - 8 magnets hold the lens tight and easy to be replaced for different terrains and light conditions when skiing and snowboarding.
Spherical View and Smooth Venting - 180+ degree panoramic view design for super clear vision and less visual interference. Optimized vent channels enhance air-flow and reduce fogging.
More Safety and Solid - Ruggedized lens with ZIONOR special EDT (Enhanced Durability Tech) for better impact-resistance and protect skier and snowboarder.
Customer Oriented Service - All ZIONOR snow goggles are designed for both men and women, we provide swift response customer service.
